alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and Pearl River Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 400 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crossroads, or 7 miles southeast of Bogalusa, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Poplarville, Crossroads and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 17 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
